pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers (other than mixers and loaders) must wear: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Waterproof gloves; Shoes plus socks. Mixers and loaders must wear: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Waterproof gloves; Shoes plus socks; Protective eyewear. Discard clothing and other absorbent materials that have been drenched or heavily contaminated with this product’s concentrate. Do not reuse them. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE. If no such instructions for washables exist, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Harmful if absorbed through skin. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Do not give any liquid to the person. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center for treatment advise.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: This product is a pyrethroid. If large amounts have been ingested, the stomach and intestines should be evacuated. Treatment is symptomatic and supportive. Digestible fats, oils, or alcohol may increase absorption and so should be avoided.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.1 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch band (T-band) over open seed furrow or in-furrow with the seed.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.5 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply BIFENTURE LFC in a minimum of 2 gallons of finished spray per acre or in a minimum of 10 gallons of finished spray per acre. Thorough coverage is required for control of listed pests.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.2 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch T-band at planting over the open seed furrow, or in-furrow with the seed.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.3 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch band over the row on the soil surface, a 5 - 7 inch band over the open furrow (T-band), in-furrow with the seed, or broadcast to the soil surface.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.1 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch band over the row on the soil surface, 5 - 7 inch band (T-band) over an open furrow, or in-furrow with the seed.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.1 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch band over the row on the soil surface, a 5 - 7 inch band over the open furrow (T-band), or in-furrow with the seed.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.3 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a soil incorporated broadcast, directed bed spray or a T-band spray into the planting furrow for the control of wireworms, rootworms, sweet potato flea beetle and white grubs.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.1 lb ai per acre per season
Application_Info.application_Method: Apply as a 5 - 7 inch band over the row on the soil surface, a 5 - 7 inch band over the open furrow (T-band), or in-furrow with the seed.
